messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.

You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Mia Fey
Description: Chief Attorney at Fey & Co.. My boss, and a very good defense attorney.
Character 1
Name: Maya Fey
Description: Mia's little sister. Found bent over her sister's body, crying.
Character 2
Name: Dick Gumshoe
Description: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.
Character 3
Name: Miles Edgeworth
Description: A gifted prosecutor, and a ruthless man who'd do anything to get a "guilty" verdict.
Character 4
Name: April May
Description: An eye witness to the events. Testifies that she saw Maya commit the murder.
Character 5
Name: Marvin Grossberg
Description: A veteran defense attorney, and Mia's mentor.
Character 6
Name: Bellboy
Description: Bellboy at the Gatewater Hotel.
Character 7
Name: Redd White
Description: An eye witness. CEO of the information gathering company, Bluecorp.
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: No one would believe I was a defense attorney if I didn't carry this.
Evidence 1
Name: The Thinker
Description: The murder weapon. Looks like a statue, but it's actually a clock. Made by Larry Butz.
Clock in the form of a statue. The clock's gears have been removed. Made by Larry Butz.
Evidence 2
Name: Glass Shards
Description: The broken remains of a glass light stand. Broken beyond all recognition.
Evidence 3
Name: Receipt
Description: A department store receipt with letters written in blood on the back.
Receipt for a glass light stand. The date of purchase is the day before the murder.
Evidence 4
Name: Maya's Memo
Description: "A conversation I had with my sister is recorded on my cell phone."
Evidence 5
Name: Mia's Autopsy Report
Description: Time of death: 9/5 at 9:00PM. Cause: single blunt force trauma. Death was instantaneous.
Died from a blow by a blunt object. May have lived for a few minutes after being hit.
Evidence 6
Name: Maya's Cell Phone
Description: Holds a conversation between the Chief and Maya. Click here for details.
Evidence 7
Name: Wiretap
Description: Found in Miss May's hotel room.
Evidence 8
Name: Floor Plans
Description: The murder scene, the Fey & Co. Law Offices. Click here for details.
Evidence 9
Name: May Testimony
Description: "The victim dodged an attack then ran to the right, but she was caught and struck."
Evidence 10
Name: Photograph
Description: On the back the words "DL-6 Incident - Exhibit A" are written in pencil.
Evidence 11
Name: Photograph
Description: On the back the words "DL-6 Incident - Exhibit B" are written in pencil.
Evidence 12
Name: Bellboy's Affidavit
Description: Describes the man who stayed with Miss May in the hotel on the night of the murder.
Evidence 13
Name: Newspaper Clipping
Description: Article about politician's suicide. The word "White" is written in pen at the top.
Evidence 14
Name: Mia's Memo
Description: A list of people's names in Mia's handwriting.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: After securing the suspect, I examined the scene of the crime with my own eyes.
Person: Gumshoe
Testimony 1
Testimony: I found a memo written on a piece of paper next to the victim's body!
Person: Gumshoe
Testimony 2
Testimony: On it, the word "Maya" was written clearly in blood!
Person: Gumshoe
Testimony 3
Testimony: Lab test results showed that the blood was the victim's!
Person: Gumshoe
Testimony 4
Testimony: Also, there was blood found on the victim's finger!
Person: Gumshoe
Testimony 5
Testimony: Before she died, the victim wrote the killer's name!
Person: Gumshoe

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
You are a helpful assistant.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: I did see everything! I did!
Person: April
Testimony 1
Testimony: The victim--the woman--dodged the first attack and ran off to the right.
Person: April
Testimony 2
Testimony: Then the girl in the hippie clothes ran after her...
Person: April
Testimony 3
Testimony: And she hit her with that weapon! I saw it! I did!
Person: April
Testimony 4
Testimony: That... that clock! Um... the kinda statue-y clock? "The Thinker," I think?
Person: April

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: Let's see, it was about 9:00, I believe.
Person: White
Testimony 1
Testimony: I was quietly perusifying... er, that's "reading" to you, some papers by the window.
Person: White
Testimony 2
Testimony: Then I heard a bedlam coming from outside!
Person: White
Testimony 3
Testimony: Surprised, I turned to look at the building across the way.
Person: White
Testimony 4
Testimony: It was then I saw him: a spiky-haired man attacking a woman with long hair!
Person: White
Testimony 5
Testimony: Needless to say that man was none other than you, Mr. Lawyer!
Person: White
Testimony 6
Testimony: I called Miss May over at once. She, too, was surprised of course.
Person: White
Testimony 7
Testimony: The victim, she... she ran away, but you gave chase!
Person: White
Testimony 8
Testimony: The victim ran to the left, and you gave chase!
Person: White
Testimony 9
Testimony: Finally there was a terrible impaction! Then it was all over...
Person: White

Testimony 0
Testimony: Miss May's testimony was correct... as was mine!
Person: White
Testimony 1
Testimony: When you assaulted the girl, she first ran to the left.
Person: White
Testimony 2
Testimony: And then you hit her, savagely! That is what I saw.
Person: White
Testimony 3
Testimony: Next, with the last of her strength, she ran to the right.
Person: White
Testimony 4
Testimony: You chased her, and delivered the final blow.
Person: White
Testimony 5
Testimony: That is what Miss May saw.
Person: White
Testimony 6
Testimony: You see? You hit her twice!
Person: White

Testimony: Umm, well, see--I looked at the other window when I heard that thing fall.
Person: White
Testimony 1
Testimony: A light stand was lying on the floor when I looked.
Person: White
Testimony 2
Testimony: Then, the next moment, I saw Miss Mia run to the left!
Person: White
Testimony 3
Testimony: The killer, you, attacked her... but she dodged.
Person: White
Testimony 4
Testimony: She turned, and ran for the door!
Person: White
Testimony 5
Testimony: Then you did her in with a single blow! Thwap!
Person: White

Characters:
Character 0
Name: Maya Fey
Description: Mia's little sister. Currently training to become a spirit medium.
Character 1
Name: Miles Edgeworth
Description: A gifted prosecutor, and a ruthless man who'd do anything to get a "guilty" verdict.
Character 2
Name: Dick Gumshoe
Description: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.
Character 3
Name: Will Powers
Description: The defendant. Action star who plays the title role in "The Steel Samurai" TV Show.
Character 4
Name: Security Lady
Description: Security guard at Global Studios. Claims she saw Powers heading to the scene.
Character 5
Name: Jack Hammer
Description: The victim. A former big name action star. Played the role of the Evil Magistrate.
Character 6
Name: Assistant
Description: Name: Penny Nichols. Assistant at Global Studios in charge of large props and set pieces.
Character 7
Name: The Director
Description: Name: Sal Manella. Creator of "The Steel Samurai." Present on the day of the crime.
Character 8
Name: Cody Hackins
Description: A big fan of the Steel Samurai. Present at the studio on the day of the crime.
Character 9
Name: Dee Vasquez
Description: High-ranking producer at Global Studios. Present on the day of the crime.
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: No one would believe I was a defense attorney if I didn't carry this.
Evidence 1
Name: Powers's Letter
Description: Document proving Will Powers's request for an attorney.
Evidence 2
Name: Guidemap
Description: Guidemap to Global Studios. Click here for details.
Evidence 3
Name: Jack's Autopsy Report
Description: Time of death: 10/15 at 2:30 PM. Cause: Pierced through the chest by a spear.
Evidence 4
Name: Cardkey
Description: Cardkey for Studio Employees. Grants access into Studio One.
Evidence 5
Name: Powers'(?) Photo
Description: Taken at the gate between the entrance and the Studios. Steel Samurai is seen walking. [Oct 15, 2:00 PM, Photo #2] 
He's dragging one leg. Click here for details. [Oct 15, 2:00 PM, Photo #2]
Evidence 6
Name: Samurai Spear
Description: This spear was found stuck in the chest of the victim.
The murder weapon. A break in the shaft has been mended with duct tape.
Evidence 7
Name: Empty Bottle → Sleeping Pill Bottle
Description: Found on a table in the employee area. The label reads "Sleeping Pills."
Found on a table in the employee area. Bears Jack Hammer's fingerprints.
Evidence 8
Name: Trailer Key
Description: The key tag reads "Studio Two Trailer".
Evidence 9
Name: Vasquez's Memo
Description: The memo read "Bring me the script from Episode 13".
Evidence 10
Name: Script
Description: A Steel Samurai script. The cover reads "Episode 13".
Evidence 11
Name: Mr. Monkey's Head
Description: Blocked the path to the scene of the crime between 2:15 PM and 4:00 PM.
Evidence 12
Name: Steel Samurai Card
Description: A trading card. Apparently, these are really popular with kids these days.
Evidence 13
Name: URP Card
Description: An "Ultra Rare Premium" Steel Samurai collectible card. Very valuable.
Evidence 14
Name: "Path to Glory"
Description: Contains photos of every victory scene in every battle the Steel Samurai has won.
Evidence 15
Name: Cody's Camera
Description: A new digital camera. Cody always carries it, though he's still learning how to use it.
Evidence 16
Name: Steak Plate
Description: Found in the employee area. On it are traces of sleeping pills and a large bone.
Evidence 17
Name: Five-Year-Old Photo
Description: Shows an accident involving Jack Hammer. Click here for details.
Evidence 18
Name: Van
Description: Manella used this van to drive Vasquez to Studio One after the meeting in the trailer.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: On the day of the murder, I arrived at the guard station at 1:00 PM.
Person: Oldbag
Testimony 1
Testimony: Poor old Hammer and the rest had been doing a run-through there since the morning.
Person: Oldbag
Testimony 2
Testimony: I, well, I had some errands to run that morning.
Person: Oldbag
Testimony 3
Testimony: Anyway, it was 1:00 when I got to the guard station.
Person: Oldbag
Testimony 4
Testimony: I was at the main gate from then until 5:00!
Person: Oldbag
Testimony 5
Testimony: Now, the murder happened at 2:30 PM, right?
Person: Oldbag
Testimony 6
Testimony: Interesting to me, because a certain man walked right by me at 2:00 PM.
Person: Oldbag
Testimony 7
Testimony: It was Powers! That man right there, and he was heading toward the studio!
Person: Oldbag

Characters:
Character 0
Name: Maya Fey
Description: My assistant until a year ago. Now she's training to be a spirit medium.
Character 1
Name: Dr. Turner Grey
Description: The director of the Grey Surgical Clinic where the malpractice incident occurred.
Character 2
Name: Pearl Fey
Description: Ran away as soon as she saw me. A girl who is Maya's little cousin.
Character 3
Name: Morgan Fey
Description: Maya's aunt. She has a strange, powerful aura about her.
Character 4
Name: Lotta Hart
Description: Claims to be an investigative photographer. She lives for the next big scoop.
Character 5
Name: Dick Gumshoe
Description: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.
Character 6
Name: Ini Miney
Description: College student. A huge fan of the occult and is doing research in parapsychology.
Character 7
Name: Mimi Miney
Description: Died in a car accident 1 year ago. Was Ini's older sister, nurse at Dr. Grey's clinic.
Character 8
Name: Mia Fey
Description: Maya's older sister. She was a top notch lawyer and my mentor and friend forever.
Character 9
Name: Franziska von Karma
Description: Became a prosecutor in Germany at age 13. A prodigy who has never known defeat.
Character 10
Name: Ami Fey
Description: Kurain Channeling Technique founder. Legend says her soul is sealed in the Sacred Urn.
Character 11
Name: Director Hotti (purported)
Description: A peculiar patient who claims to be Director Hotti. Seems to be extremely "healthy".
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.
Evidence 1
Name: Guidemap (Fey Manor)
Description: A diagram of Fey Manor. Meditation room to the south. Channeling chamber north of meditation room. Side room to the east, have to go through winding path from meditation room to get to side room.
Evidence 2
Name: Maya's Magatama
Description: Slightly translucent. It's small, but it has a deep, profound aura about it.
Slightly translucent. It radiates softly with a mysterious light.
Evidence 3
Name: Newspaper Clipping 1
Description: One year ago on May 2nd, 14 patients died from malpractice at Grey Surgical Clinic.
Evidence 4
Name: Folding Screen
Description: About 8 inches off the ground is a small hole that looks like a bullet hole.
Evidence 5
Name: Black Key
Description: An old steel key. A green jewel is set in the center of the key's grip.
Evidence 6
Name: Newspaper Clipping 2
Description: Mimi Miney, nurse at Grey Surgical Clinic, died after falling asleep at the wheel.
Articles about the car accident. This is a newspaper clipping about the death of Mimi Miney, the nurse who worked at Turner Grey's clinic. It reads how Mimi died as a result of her car crashing when she fell asleep at the wheel and Director Hotti fills in some further parts of the article later on. The content is as follows-Highway of Nightmares-May 24 - Late last night, two women's car crashed into a highway center divide. One of the women was not able to escape the flaming wreckage and died at the site. Ongoing investigation has revealed that the driver had fallen asleep at the wheel. -Ms. Ini Miney Holds Interview About Crash- I was like, really tired and I dropped off to sleep. Then there was this crash, and like, I woke up in a huge sea of flames. I was like, still half-asleep, but I opened the right door and like, got out. I don't, like, remember anything else. -Doctor Lurking in the Shadows? If Ms. Ini Miney is to be believed, the one driving the car was her sister, Mimi Miney. Mimi Miney was the nurse at Grey Surgical Clinic where 14 patients were accidentally overdosed to their death. Is this then, just a mere coincidence...? 
Evidence 7
Name: Floor Plans (Crime Scene)
Description: A diagram of the Channeling Chamber. A four sectioned mat in front of a platform at the head.
Evidence 8
Name: Dr. Grey's Autopsy Report
Description: After being stabbed in the chest, he was shot in the forehead at point-blank.
Stabbed in chest then shot at point-blank. Gunpowder residue around bullet hole.
Evidence 9
Name: Pistol
Description: Murder weapon. Was Grey's. Two shots fired. Bears Maya's and Grey's fingerprints.
Evidence 10
Name: Knife
Description: Murder weapon. A small fruit knife. Belongs to the Fey's. Bears Maya's fingerprints.
Evidence 11
Name: Maya's Costume
Description: Clothes Maya was wearing at the time of the murder. There are blood splatters on it.
Clothes Maya was wearing at the time of the murder. This is Maya's robe that she wore on the day of Turner Grey's murder. It is stained with blood splatter and a bullet hole is present in the sleeve. The robe is otherwise clean. It is purple in color.
Evidence 12
Name: Lotta's Photo 1
Description: A picture taken at the murder scene. This is a photo taken by Lotta Hart of Maya Fey after they break into the Channeling Chamber when they hear a gunshot. Turner Grey is lying dead on the floor after being shot.
Evidence 13
Name: Lotta's Photo 2
Description: A picture taken at the murder scene. This is the second photo taken by Lotta Hart of Maya Fey after they break into the Channeling Chamber when they hear a gunshot. Turner Grey is lying dead on the floor after being shot behind her.
Evidence 14

Description: Ami Fey's spirit is sealed within. It's chipped and cracked all over.
Broken by Pearl right before the murder. Under repair in the hallway until police came.

Description: Popular young actor who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.

Description: Engarde's manager. An intelligent woman who seems to have it all together.

Name: Franziska von Karma

Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge

Description: Seems like the Nickel Samurai is to confess something after the post-ceremony stage show.

Name: Radio Transceiver
Description: Originally from the Bellboy. It can transmit and receive signals over great distances.
Originally from Maya's kidnapper, who goes by the name of "De Killer".
Evidence 5
Name: Lotta's Camera
Description: A very expensive item valued at $1,600. It was stolen around the time of the murder.
Stolen on the night of the murder. Tabloid article about the victim was in the case.
Evidence 6
Name: Hotel Guidemap
Description: Map of the Gatewater Hotel around the crime scene. A path from the west leads to the viola hall. To the north of the path is engarde and to the south corrida. East of viola hall is the lobby.
Evidence 7
Name: Guitar Case
Description: Found next to the victim. Empty. There is some water, but only on top of the lid.
Empty. There is some water, but only on top of the lid. Bears only Corrida's fingerprints.
Evidence 8
Name: Wine Glass
Description: Found next to the victim. It's filled with tomato juice. No sign it's been drank.
Found next to the victim. It's filled with tomato juice. Bears Andrews' fingerprints.
Evidence 9
Name: Crime Photo
Description: Photo of Juan Corrida's murder scene. The victim sits on a chair in a samurai outfit. There is a knife sticking out of his chest. A glass of juice sits behind him on the dresser. A full bottle of juice sits on the desk in front of him. A open guitar case lies on the floor next to him. Next to the guitar case are the remains of a smashed vase that has stained the carpet with water.
Evidence 10
Name: Autograph
Description: Juan Corrida's autograph. "To my dearest Wendy" is written on it.
Evidence 11
Name: Magazine Clipping
Description: An "article" from the tabloid "Gossip Land". The contents of the article follow: *Jammin' Midnight Rendezvous!?*

A super-star in an ultra-hot, mega-secret
love scandal!?

Reliable sources say that Juan Corrida
has been getting in close with the
mysterious, yet beautiful manager to the
stars, Ms. A.A.!

Description: Deceased: Celeste InpaxFound by: Juan CorridaWas her suicide note hidden?

Description: Attempter: Adrian AndrewsReason: Shock from Celeste Inpax's suicide.
Evidence 14
Name: Juan's Autopsy Report
Description: Time of death: 8:15 PMCause: Strangled to death with a scarf, then stabbed with a knife.
Evidence 15
Name: Knife
Description: Bears the victim's blood and Engarde's fingerprints. In the grip, "Gatewater" is engraved.

Description: Was ripped from his costume. Is covered in Corrida's blood. Found in Engarde's "hakama".
Evidence 17
Name: Lotta's Photo
Description: Picture taken in the Hallway right after the murder. A person in samurai garb stands outside the door.

Description: Was placed next to the victim at the time of the murder. Ms. Andrews was carrying it.

Description: "Please feed my cat, Shoe. My house is just a little ways down from the hotel."
Evidence 21

Description: Set to record the victim's room from 8 PM for 1 hour. Was running at time of murder.
Evidence 22
Name: Transmitter
Description: Changes the footage taken by the spy camera into radio waves and transmits the data.

Name: Stuffed Bear
Description: The spy camera was set in its right eye. Found in the victim's room.

A wooden puzzle with a hollow inside. Only Corrida and Andrews know how to open it.

Name: Attorney's Badge

Name: Sports Paper
Description: Dates from December 3rd, the day of the incident. On it is a doodle that said 'MC Bomber' with an arrow pointing to '100,000' that was crossed out. 'Ahahahaha' and a laughing face are written next to it.
Left by a costumer in Trés Bien on Dec. 3rd. Click here for details.
Evidence 4
Name: Job Listings
Description: Picked up from a bench in Vitamin Square. Thrown away by the old man.
Evidence 5
Name: Lunch Special
Description: Trés Bien lunch special. Costs 20 dollars despite how unbelievably bad it tastes.

Name: Small Bottle
Description: Found in the kitchen. Shape is different from the others bottles. Contents unknown.
The victim's ear medicine. Found covered in unidentified fingerprints in the kitchen.
Evidence 7
Name: Scooter
Description: Ridden by my phony. The wheel guard is all smashed up.
Evidence 8
Name: Jean's Loan Contract
Description: Jean's debt is half a million dollars. The owner of the loan is Tender Lender.
Evidence 9
Name: Victor's Note
Description: "Convicted before, a wicked man or woman, repeat offender -- Victor Kudo"
Evidence 10
Name: Glen's Autopsy Report
Description: Died of potassium cyanide poisoning. Time of death was between 1:30 and 2:30 PM.
Evidence 11
Name: Trés Bien Floor Plans
Description: Blueprints of the crime scene. Click here for details. X = victim's seat.
Evidence 12
Name: Crime Photo
Description: A photo of the scene taken from near the kitchen. Two dining tables are separated by a folding screen. The one closer to the camera is empty. The other one is where the victim collapse on the table. There is an intact vase on each table. A coffee cup is knocked over and the the table cloth is stained by coffee. Near the coffee table are some pieces of papers. No one is sitting across from the victim.
Evidence 13
Name: Coffee Cup
Description: The coffee contained potassium cyanide. Covered in the victim and Maggey's fingerprints. Facing the cup, one can see a lip stain on the front, and a floral looking handle to the right.

Description: A winning ticket for half a million dollars. Found during a body search of Maggey.

Name: Apron
Description: Worn by Maggey at the time of the incident. Has small pockets but big stains.
Evidence 16
Name: Potassium Cyanide
Description: A deadly powdery poison. Bears Maggey's fingerprints. Found in her apron pocket.
Evidence 17
Name: Victim's Prescription Bag
Description: The victim got this from the doctor before going to Trés Bien. The bag is empty.
Evidence 18
Name: Victor's Testimony
Description: "When the incident occurred, I broke the vase at my seat. I'm sorry."
Evidence 19
Name: Millionaire Radio Flyer
Description: Experience the most thrilling ten minutes of your life every Monday at 1:30 PM!
